title: The Last of Us PS5 Remake Leaked! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.09.22
description:
Go to  http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 15% off your first order or 25% off your first Membership item.

Go to http://chime.com/kfgames to get started with Chime.

Greg and Tim reunite IN PERSON to cover the final moments before Summer Game Fest. The Last of Us Part I, Xbox on TVs, and Ghostbusters on PSVR2!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:11 - Last Predictions
00:03:50 - Housekeeping
SGF is today! Twitch and YouTube!
Quarry review is up now and the Spoilercast is going up tomorrow!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:51 - The Last of Us Remake LEAKED
00:26:15 - Ads
00:28:05 - Xbox is planning to offer at least 5 new games across the next year
00:35:58 - Xbox App on Samsung TVs
00:39:14 - Xbox Cloud Gaming will support your game library later this year
00:41:36 - Xbox Project Moorcroft will bring early game demos to Xbox Game Pass
00:43:52 - WHO YA GONNA CALL? We got two Ghostbusters Day Updates for the gaming world
00:48:55 - Out today
00:51:36 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Mike and Andy

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
